kw.name: GET On Session
kw.msg: GET Request : url=http://localhost:8082/assets path_url=/assets headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.3', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'token': 'xpaXAZ_LyGbP1u-ORioKcb45pqXlLtO0'} body=None

GET Response : url=http://localhost:8082/assets status=200, reason= headers={'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Transfer-Encoding': 'chunked', 'Date': 'Mon, 07 Oct 2024 09:14:41 GMT', 'Keep-Alive': 'timeout=60', 'Connection': 'keep-alive'} body=[{"assetId":"a001","assetName":"Macbook Pro","assetType":1,"inUse":true},{"assetId":"a002","assetName":"Lenovo B112","assetType":2,"inUse":true},{"assetId":"a003","assetName":"Apple Iphone 11","assetType":3,"inUse":true},{"assetId":"a004","assetName":"Macbook Air","assetType":1,"inUse":true},{"assetId":"a005","assetName":"Xiaomi Mi6","assetType":4,"inUse":true}]
kw.doc: Sends a GET request on a previously created HTTP Session.
